51815.<start_lip_sync n00743 _normal m00001>「オ:
<start_lip_sync n00743 _normal m00001>Okay. The Blue Goddess Gem looks like it's been
successfully offered to the River of Light.<stop_lip_animation n00743 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51816.<start_lip_sync n00743 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00743 _normal m00001>Alright then, next let's pray to the Goddess.
Relax to draw out the power.<stop_lip_animation n00743 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51818.どこからともなく 声が 聞こえてくる。: From out of nowhere, a voice can be heard.

51820.<center>魔瘴がもたらす 悪しきチカラは\nアストルティアに住む 生あるも:
<center>The Demon Miasma drew out an evil power, that
transformed all living things of Astoltia into
monsters.

51821.<center>楽園の時代は 終わりを告げ\n多くの子らが その手に武器を取り\:
<center>That marked the end of the Age of Paradise, and many of
Astoltia's children took up arms and threw themselves
into battle against the monsters.

51822.<center>六聖陣は この 新たなチカラに望みを託し\n立ち上がりし者たちの:
<center>The Six Saints placed hope in this new power, and took
it upon themselves to release the hidden potential of
those who had risen to the occasion.

51823.<center>ここに 魔瘴に侵されし者と\nチカラを解放され 使命に目覚めし者:
<center>Here, the Demon Miasma stricken, and those awakened
ones free of its power, drew the curtain on a new
age in the Holy War.
